title: Update Customer Account Email Address
description: A customer needs to change the email address associated with their account.

tasks.description: Authenticate the customer's identity using their old email and a security question.
Update the email address in the customer's profile.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully changes the email in the system.

tasks.description: Send a verification link to the new email address to confirm the change.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent triggers the verification email process.
